DOC.brief_title: 6 Minute Propulsion Test Sensitivity Increased Aerobic Capacity
DOC.detailed_description: The 6 minute walk test widely use assessment aerobic capacity , function , functional change ambulatory population . A similar clinical research outcome instrument responsive change aerobic capacity function lack person spinal cord injury ( SCI ) . A 6 minute push test , adapt 6 minute walk test may fill void . The primary aim project assess distance travel 6 minute wheelchair propulsion change increase aerobic capacity . We hypothesize participant push far 6 minute aerobic capacity increase . The secondary aim explore correlation 6MPT distance handicap , depression , wheelchair satisfaction , self-reported avoidance environmental feature . We hypothesize increase 6MPTdistance correlate decrease depression , decrease handicap , decrease self-reported avoidance environmental feature , increase wheelchair satisfaction . This low risk , high benefit study .
